Projects.title: CipherSQL Studio
desc: CipherSQLStudio is a browser-based interactive SQL learning platform designed to help users learn and practice SQL with hands-on assignments, hints, and progress tracking. Itâ€™s built as a full-stack application with a frontend interface, backend server, and database integration.

The platform provides a hands-on learning experience where users can select SQL problems, understand the table schema, write queries in an advanced Monaco-powered editor (similar to VS Code), and execute them instantly against a sandboxed PostgreSQL environment. This allows learners to practice in a safe, controlled database without risking real data.

Projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
desc: This is my personal portfolio website that I created to showcase my projects and skills. The website is built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. The website is fully responsive and designed to be user-friendly and engaging.
The website has a few features such as a home page, a projects page, a about page, and a contact page. The website also has a few animations and transitions to make it more engaging and interactive.

Projects.title: CucumberBDD Rest-Assured
desc: RestAssured-CucumberBDD is an API Test Automation Framework built using Java, Rest Assured, and Cucumber BDD to validate RESTful APIs in a structured and behavior-driven way. This framework automates testing of the Restful Booker demo application, ensuring the correctness of critical operations such as authentication, booking creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion.

The framework follows a Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) approach where test scenarios are written in Gherkin language to make tests readable, business-friendly, and easy to understand. These Gherkin steps are mapped to Java step definitions that use Rest Assured to execute HTTP requests, handle payloads, verify status codes, response bodies, headers, schemas, and validate end-to-end API workflows.

Projects.title: Uttar Pradesh Tourism
desc: This project is a comprehensive web application designed to showcase the rich cultural heritage, historical landmarks, and tourist attractions of Uttar Pradesh, India.
With a focus on clean design and smooth navigation, the project aims to make tourism information easily accessible, promoting exploration of Uttar Pradesh diverse offerings.
